Neste post irei desmonstrar uma API de calculo de **Regressão Linear**.

::: {#fcf8d144 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression

X = np.loadtxt('X.txt').reshape(-1,1)
Y = np.loadtxt('Y.txt')

model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X, Y)

pred = model.predict(X)

plt.scatter(X, Y)
plt.plot(X, pred)
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.title('Regressao Linear')
plt.savefig('grafico.png')
print('Coeficiente:', model.coef_[0], 'Intercepto:', model.intercept_)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Coeficiente: 983.8895333668877 Intercepto: 403.86455678909624
```
